scripts.pack-release: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$pkg = Resolve-Path package.json; $root = Split-Path $pkg -Parent; $parent = Split-Path $root -Parent; $json = Get-Content $pkg | ConvertFrom-Json; $v = $json.version; $n = $json.name; $temp = Join-Path $root 'temp_pack'; $target = Join-Path $temp ('user/mods/' + $n + '-' + $v); New-Item -Path $target -ItemType Directory -Force | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path (Join-Path $root '*') -Destination $target -Recurse -Force -Exclude 'temp_pack'; & 'C:/Program Files/WinRAR/rar.exe' a -r -ep1 (Join-Path $parent ($n + '-' + $v + '.rar')) (Join-Path $temp 'user'); Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $temp"
scripts.build:zip: npm run clean:environment && npm run build:unzipped && npm run zip:files
